job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-16T08:27:56.000Z", "description": "
Summary
Seeking an experienced SRE responsible for engineering, upkeep, and automation of internet scale load-balancing and proxy services.


Key Qualifications
Strong knowledge of TCP, HTTP, DNS and SSL protocols

Experience with distributed systems in a production operations environment

Systems configuration management experience with automation tools such as Puppet, Chef, Ansible, or Salt

Experience with programming and/or scripting languages (Python, Perl, Java, bash, Ruby)

Systems monitoring experience with tools such as Nagios, Sensu, Zabbix, graphite

Experience with devops tools, processes, and culture

Experience with microservices/cloud platforms such as Kubernetes a plus

Strong communication skills and ability to work effectively across multiple business and technical teams

Troubleshooting of traffic flows at a deep level to find anomalies and to optimize performance

Demonstrated ability to deliver results on time with high quality


Description
The Edge Traffic Delivery SRE team is a core engineering group with a mission of providing massively scaled load-balancing and proxy solutions to many of Apple's best known services. We are passionate about design, implementation, and support of our cutting-edge products. In addition to traffic engineering, we often work with encryption technologies, monitoring/alerting, cloud computing, automation, etc.


We are looking for a motivated devOps engineer, who can work with internal customers, then ultimately engineer, deliver, and maintain sophisticated solutions. Come join us and see what it means to \"Think Different\"!


Education & Experience
BS in Computer Science or equivalent experience


Role Number: 200227180
